About STGiphy

Learn more about STGiphy

STGiphy Web Application

STGiphy web application pulls a selected number of gifs from the Giphy API and displays them on the HOME page.

The original source for this information was taken from a YouTube tutorial at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x9Vy-wmtYic

The github repository for this applicaiton can be found at: https://github.com/scotttct/stgiphy
